name: Macbeth Act.IV
description:
=== WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING ===

=== ABOUT ===

This is a walking simulator game. The story is adapted from Shakespeare's Macbeth, Act. 4 - 5. The player takes the role of Macbeth and walks into the mysterious forest to seek the witches's prophecy.

=== CONTROLS ===

Use W/S to move forwad/backward
